title: Tophany Non Toxic Easy Peel Off and Fast Dry Nail Polish Set for Pack, Eco Friendly and Organic Water Based Nail Polish for Women,Teens(10 Bottles)
features: Non-Toxic & Eco-friendly : The nail polish set is non-toxic,eco-friendly, non-irritating. There is no DBP chemicals, toluene or formaldehyde. Best choice for Women, Girls and Teens.After applying, the nail polish smells like a scent

Fast Drying and Removable : The unique formula makes it dry in about 120 seconds, without the need to bake the bulb, let your fingers soak in warm water for a while, you can easily tear off the nail polish without using any nail polish remover

Multiple Colour : The rich color of nail polish set allows you to adapt to any occasion, such as leisure, nightclubs, parties, weddings, etc. Professional nail polish has stylish, latest colors that can complement your skin tone and wear. You can have different nail colors every day

Easy to use : No need UV lamp, LED lamp nail dryer, Quick dry formula.Just choose the color nail polish you like and brush it twice with the hair brush in the usual way. The entire operation takes only 8 minutes
Product Contains and Customer Service : Our Product Including 1 box of nail polish (10 Bottles). Any problems about our products,Please contact us,We will try our best to help you deal with the issue
description: Professional nail polish has stylish, latest colors that can complement your skin tone and wear. You can have different nail colors every day Features: 1.Made of eco-friendly material, no irritating smell, no-harm to skin 2.Water-Based Peelable Formulation 3.Easy to be peeled off directly 4.66% Aqua, Mineral pigments, Polyurethane resin. The low-odor formula, safe nail polish for both adults & children Package Contents: 10 Pcs Water-Based Nail Polishes Set ( 5ml/Bottles ) How To Use? 1.Soak Cotton Pad with Polish Remover, Clean Along the Nail and Surface. 2.Apply a Thin Layer of Base Coat, Please Do Not Apply it Repeatedly, After Dry-up. 3. Apply The First Layer of Colored Nail Polish , After Dry-up, The Color is a Little Light. 4.Apply the Second Layer of Colored Nail Polish After Dry-up, You Can See Full and Uniform Color. 5.Apply the Last Layer of Top Coat After Dry-up, To Protect Nail Polish and Brighten Your Nails. Long Lasting secretï¼š 1.Soak cotton pad with polish remover, Clean along the nail and surface 2.Do housework with gloves to avoid contact with water for a long time 3.Do not take a shower and wash your hair within 4 hours after you have just finished nail polish IMPORTANT NOTICE: 1.Water-based nail polish keep time will be lower than gel nail polish, this is the commonality of all water-based nail polish. 2.This nail polish is not a food or drink, please avoid kids swallowed, and eyes contact.
